name: Arun Prakash
title: Founder & CEO
about: Arun Prakash, widely known as 'T-Man' for his deep passion for technology, is the Founder & CEO of GUVI Geek Network. With over 20 years of experience in top tech companies like Honeywell, PayPal, Kalido, and Symantec, he has been instrumental in democratizing tech skills globally through GUVI. Under his leadership, GUVI evolved over a decade of dedicated work, inspired by the late co-founder Ms. Sridevi Arunprakash, to become a leading startup in the EdTech industry.
achievements: Led GUVI to achieve two Guinness World Records for AI coding lessons and online programming participation
Invited to Oxford University in 2024 to speak on 'How Vernacular learning is transforming Technology learning'
Recognized as a Youth Icon at the IYONS International Summit
Awarded Leading Social Entrepreneur Award by Action for India in 2019
GUVI awarded 'Most Trusted Vernacular EduTech Award' by ZEE Digital
quote: Technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of language or background.

name: Kannan Hari
title: Co-founder & Founder
about: Kannan Hari, an engineer-turned-entrepreneur, co-founded Palm Era Foods with Abinaya, driven by a mission to preserve the endangered legacy of the Palmyra palm in Tamil Nadu. His journey began after witnessing the felling of palm trees due to crop damage and discovering the challenges faced by palm climbers, including low income and lack of standardization. Palm Era aims to elevate palm-based products to premium quality through innovation and branding, and reintroduce nutrient-rich, low-glycemic palm products into daily diets, especially for children. He applies systematic thinking and process-building skills from his extensive IT career to his food brand, focusing on quality, transparency, and tradition, with a vision to provide certified, clean nutrition from Tamil Nadu to the world.
achievements: Co-founded Palm Era Foods to preserve the Palmyra palm legacy and promote healthy, natural food products
Developed powdered palm jaggery in collaboration with university researchers to extend shelf life and enhance convenience
Secured multiple certifications for Palm Era products including FSSAI, ZED, AGMARK, Pesticide & Residue-Free, FDA, and MSME Udyam registration
Led Palm Era to become the only palm jaggery brand in the world with AGMARK certification
Increased harvest volumes and expanded the palm climber network through optimized processing and improved remuneration
Implemented year-round employment initiatives for village women by processing palm sprouts during the off-season
Transitioned from a high-paying corporate IT job to social entrepreneurship
Secured initial funding/support for Palm Era (implied by 'The Turning Point & Tanseed Fund')
Featured in The New Indian Express for initiating a 'palm revolution' in the state
Registered Palm Era Foods Private Limited on December 1, 2022
quote: The country's economy grows only when villages grow.

name: Kalai Kathiravan
title: Managing Partner | Founder, Director & CEO
organization: Lemurian Bazaar | Lemurian Ventures Private Limited
about: Kalai Kathiravan is a pivotal figure in the agri-food sector in Tamil Nadu, India, serving as the Managing Partner of Lemurian Bazaar and concurrently as the Founder, Director, and CEO of Lemurian Ventures Private Limited. Operating from a remote village in Ramanathapuram, his mission is to deliver traditional, regional, hygienic, and nutritionally potent agri-products directly from farms to homes across India.[1, 2] He applies systematic thinking and process-building skills, implicitly learned from his background as a 'techie' who quit his IT job to venture into selling dry fish.[3] His leadership bridges traditional agricultural practices with modern business strategies, focusing on quality, transparency, and community empowerment
achievements: Co-founded and serves as Director and CEO of Lemurian Ventures Private Limited, incorporated on May 6, 2022
Successfully launched Lemurian Bazaar products on Amazon, achieving sales of Rs 3 lakh per month
Secured and manages the 'One Station, One Product' (OSOP) opportunity for dry fish at Madurai Railway Junction, evolving from a table setup to a permanent 'dry fish hut'
Projected to achieve a turnover of 15 lakhs per month and a total turnover of 2 crore in the first year through the OSOP initiative
Collaborates with Puthumaipen, a 10-member women's self-help group in Mandapam, for packing dry fish, contributing to local employment
Implemented modern branding techniques, including QR codes on dry fish packaging linking to cooking recipes
Garnered significant media recognition, with features in Hindustan Times, Tholil Uzhagam, Puthiya Thalaimurai, and Dinakaran
Holds a directorship in CROPORIUM PRIVATE LIMITED, appointed on April 11, 2024
quote: From a small village to national markets, my mission is to prove that traditional products can thrive in the modern economy without losing their authenticity.

name: Santhos Premraj
title: Co-Founder & Head of Product
about: Santhos Premraj is the Co-Founder and Head of Product at Ticket9, an innovative Event Tech SaaS platform based in Coimbatore, India. With a decade of experience spanning events, technology, and marketing, he is dedicated to simplifying the event management process by automating traditionally manual tasks.His background in corporate IT, including roles at Tata Consultancy Services and Cognizant, has equipped him with systematic thinking and process-building skills, which he applies to prioritize quality and transparency in his entrepreneurial ventures.He is passionate about wellness, clean ingredients, and meaningful entrepreneurship, with a leadership style marked by a commitment to growth and positive community impact.The idea for Ticket9 originated from identifying inefficiencies in manual event management, leading to its rapid expansion from a modest bedroom to a 26-seat office space.
achievements: Successfully pivoted Ticket9 to support virtual and hybrid events during the COVID-19 pandemic, organizing over 60 virtual events with 500+ attendees
Secured $120K in pre-seed funding for Ticket9 on May 24, 2023
Attracted strategic investors, including actress Nayanthara and director Vignesh Shivan, in a Seed round on September 18, 2024
Grew Ticket9 from a 'modest bedroom' to a '26-seat office space'
Instrumental in automating traditionally manual processes in event management

Holds multiple professional certifications including Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM®), The Open Group Certified: TOGAF® 9 Certified, ServiceNow Certified System Administrator, AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate, and Project Management Professional (PMP)® .
Recognized as an Event Tech Innovator
Drives product development with a strong focus on customer feedback and user experience
quote: Building a product with real scenes in SaaS is no small feat; it underscores the complexity and depth of the process!

name: Vinoth Kumar Chandran
title: Director
about: Dr. Vinoth Kumar Chandran is a Director at Bipolar Factory Private Limited, appointed on December 22, 2023.[1, 2] He brings over two decades of extensive experience in healthcare management, having held significant positions at renowned institutions like Apollo Hospitals Group, Global Health City, and KIMS Health.[3, 4, 5] His academic background includes a doctorate and post-graduate degrees in Hospital Management, Business Management, Medical Law & Ethics, Materials Management, and Labour Laws.[3, 4, 5] He is recognized for multiple world records and holds the prestigious Level 3 'Qimpro Certified Qualitist' badge, a recognition conceptualized by Dr. J. M. Juran, the 'Father of Quality'.[3, 4, 5] Bipolar Factory specializes in Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning Solutions, Metaverse Development, and IoT Development, aiming to harness technology for societal betterment and champion 'Make in India' products globally.[6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11] The company has its registered office in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, and an operational focus in Bengaluru North, Karnataka.[12, 13, 14, 15, 10, 16, 11]
expertise: Quality Management Systems (ISO, NABH, NABL, ACHSI, JCI)
achievements: Awarded Asia Healthcare Excellence Award (2016)
Received Pride of India Award (2017)
Named Healthcare Personality of the Year (2017)
Awarded World Health & Wellness Congress Award (2018)
Record holder in India Book of Records (IBR), Asia Book of Records (ABR), World Book of Records (UK), and Guinness World Records
First healthcare supply chain management professional to achieve record-holder status in multiple world record books
First healthcare management professional in India to secure a place in World Book of Records (UK) and Guinness World Records
Awarded Level 3 (Highest) Badge – 'Qimpro Certified Qualitist' from QIMPRO Foundation
Appointed Director at Bipolar Factory Private Limited on December 22, 2023
Serves as a Director at Pharmbioz Healthcare Private Limited
quote: The true future of healthcare lies at the intersection of compassion and cutting-edge technology.

name: Vasu Karthi
title: Co-Founder and CEO
about: Vasu Karthi is the Co-Founder and CEO of Magic 20 Tamil, an app-based platform dedicated to translating and summarizing global business, marketing, and self-help English books into accessible Tamil audio formats... His mission is to 'bridge the gap between global wisdom and Tamil culture' by making world-class knowledge available to Tamil speakers... The platform offers concise 20-minute summaries, utilizing colloquial language and localized examples to cater to busy professionals and aspiring entrepreneurs who view time as a precious commodity and learning as an ongoing journey.[1, 2] He is also a director at Bookspark Media Private Limited, the legal entity behind Magic 20 Tamil.. Vasu Karthi actively engages in public discussions on business topics, emphasizing effective communication and strategic positioning.[3]
achievements: Led Magic 20 Tamil to expand its content library to over 400 book summaries and more than 40 Masterclass podcasts
Secured funding for Magic 20 Tamil from Cultiv8 (CIET - TBI)
Attracted a diverse group of angel investors and industry leaders, including C K Kumaravel, R Pallavarajan, K Mohan, Ananth Mani, and SP Balamurugan
Established a strategic partnership with Krea University to offer a '3-Day Executive Education Program (Mini MBA)' for working professionals and entrepreneurs
Oversees content creation and production, utilizing expert writers, professional voice artists, RJs, celebrities, and television personalities to ensure high-quality, localized audio content
Serves as a director of Bookspark Media Private Limited, the legal entity incorporated on August 4, 2022, that underpins Magic 20 Tamil .
quote: Bridging the gap between global wisdom and Tamil culture is not just a mission—it’s a responsibility.

name: K. T. Srinivasa Raja
title: Managing Director
about: K. T. Srinivasa Raja is the Managing Director of Adyar Ananda Bhavan (also known as A2B), the iconic South Indian sweets and QSR chain that began as a family-run sweets shop and has grown into a multi-crore enterprise with over 145 outlets across India and abroad.
achievements: Co-leading the transformation of a single sweets shop into a nationwide chain with international presence :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
Featured in Outlook Business as the Managing Director driving A2B’s global expansion :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
Recipient of the CII Southern Region Entrepreneurs Award as Managing Director of Adyar Ananda Bhavan Sweets India Pvt Ltd :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
quote: From humble beginnings to a global brand, it’s about preserving tradition while embracing innovation.

name: Anusha V
title: Founder and CEO
about: Anusha V is the Founder and CEO of Narchuvai Foods, a D2C brand specializing in premium heritage gifting and traditional food products for modern lifestyles. Hailing from a Chettinad family with a deep cultural connection to food, her passion for traditional cooking was ignited in her mother's kitchen, where hygienic and delicious health mixes, masalas, and podis were crafted. Recognizing a market gap for such authentic products, she founded Narchuvai Foods to bridge the rich culinary past with the demands of the fast-paced present. Despite marrying at 15, she later pursued education and built a career in digital marketing, which provides a strong foundation for Narchuvai's D2C model. The brand name 'Narchuvai' (நல்ல சுவை) reflects her commitment to 'good taste' and preserving age-old culinary wisdom.
expertise: Entrepreneurship (especially for women and home-based entrepreneurs)
achievements: Founded Narchuvai Foods to bring traditional, hygienic, and nutritious Chettinad food products to a wider audience
Successfully established Narchuvai Foods as a D2C brand focused on premium heritage gifting
Ensures products are homemade, handcrafted, and preservative-free, maintaining authentic quality
Secured comprehensive quality certifications including FSSAI, ZED, AGMARK, and Pesticide & Residue-Free for Narchuvai products
Achieved high customer satisfaction with an average rating of 4.9 out of 5 on platforms like Justdial, with positive feedback on flavor, freshness, and packaging
Actively participates as a speaker in business forums, sharing insights on building and scaling D2C food brands
Hosts webinars to encourage and guide aspiring entrepreneurs, particularly women and home-based entrepreneurs, in digital marketing and brand building
Expanded market reach through partnerships, making products available for international shipping (e.g., via Madrascart.com to US and Canada)
quote: Narchuvai, a name that shows my deep love for preserving age-old culinary wisdom. I picked this name to share the richness of taste and bring people closer to our traditional flavors!

name: Umasankaran P
title: Founder & CEO
organization: Startup News Tamil & Free Famous Food
about: Umasankaran P is a multifaceted entrepreneur and ecosystem builder, known for founding Startup News Tamil and Free Famous Food. A graphic designer by background, he moved to Singapore in 2002 to pursue a Higher Diploma in Communication Science... In 2009, he founded Aadhii Designs in Singapore, providing branding services to restaurants and salons. In 2015, he launched Free Famous Food (FFF) in Singapore as a bootstrapped venture, aiming to disrupt the advertising industry by offering 100% free food vouchers, leveraging the 'urge for free offers' psychology... He successfully expanded FFF to India in 2018, starting in his hometown Thanjavur and then to other Tamil Nadu cities, overcoming initial public skepticism that 'free is fake'.He also founded Startup News Tamil, a platform dedicated to building and celebrating the Tamil Startup Ecosystem, providing authentic startup stories and updates in Tamil.[2] His work focuses on business strategy, branding, marketing, and startup mentorship, actively contributing to the regional entrepreneurial landscape.
expertise: Branding (for F&B, salons, and startup ecosystems)
Marketing Innovation (disruptive models, digital marketing, social media)
Business Strategy (market gap identification, new business model creation)
achievements: Founded Free Famous Food (FFF) in Singapore in 2015 as a bootstrapped venture with Rs 2.5 lakh capital
Successfully gained 52 F&B partners and 4,000 registered users for FFF in Singapore
Launched FFF in India in 2018, expanding to Thanjavur, Chennai, Madurai, Tiruchirapalli, Coimbatore, Salem, and Kodaikanal
Achieved a turnover of Rs 50 lakh for FFF in India (as of May 2019), with 30 F&B partners and 700 registered users
Successfully overcame the 'Free is Fake' challenge, building customer trust for FFF's unique model
Founded Startup News Tamil, positioning it as the 'go-to destination for authentic startup stories and updates in Tamil'
Established Startup News Tamil as a media partner for incubators, accelerators, co-working spaces, and investors within the Tamil startup ecosystem
Actively contributes to building and celebrating the Tamil Startup Ecosystem locally and globally
Demonstrated resilience by overcoming skepticism about his age and capabilities in his entrepreneurial journey
quote: Our USP is we persuade the consumers on the psychology of 'urge for free offers' and pull large crowd-base traffic to the portal as users. More than convincing the restaurants to partner with us, it was difficult to make people understand that FFF vouchers are not fake.

name: Sreeja Mohan
title: Founder and CEO
about: Sreeja Mohan is the Founder and CEO of My Peeli, a multifaceted digital content management agency based in Coimbatore, India. Established in 2017, My Peeli initially focused on content writing services and has since expanded to offer a comprehensive suite of digital solutions.Sreeja's personal journey, including her early marriage and subsequent career in digital marketing, highlights her resilience and adaptability.[2] Her deep passion for the arts, evident in her roles as a lyricist, blogger ('WHY KNOCK?!'), and independent artist, directly influences My Peeli's 'Creative Factory' ethos, enabling the agency to craft compelling and results-driven digital narratives.She also holds significant roles in various financial and trading firms, demonstrating a strong business acumen beyond creative endeavors.Her mission for My Peeli is to empower client stories to transcend business boundaries and stand out in the digital sphere.
expertise: Digital Marketing (SEO, Social Media, YouTube, Email, SMS, Google Ads)
Content Creation (Web, Social Media, Technical, Travel Mass Media, Scriptwriting)
Branding & Design (Logo, Brochures, Posters, Product Photography, Packaging)
Financial Services (Gold Trading, Kuries & Loans, Chits)
achievements: Founded My Peeli in 2017, evolving it from a content writing service to a comprehensive digital solutions agency ..
Established Peeli Digital Academy, offering courses, communities, webinars, and digital products to foster digital literacy and entrepreneurship [6, 5]

Holds multiple directorships and partnerships in financial and trading firms, including PONALLUR GOLD TRADING FIRM LLP, HUMAN WELFARE KURIES AND LOANS PVT LTD, and HUMANWELFARE CHITS (PONALLUR) PRIVATE LIMITED [4]
Recognized as Chief Creative Officer of My Peeli, infusing artistic flair into digital strategies
Known for her creative work as a lyric writer (Tamil), blogger, and independent artist
Successfully transitioned from early life challenges to build a career in digital marketing
quote: Creativity is not just an art—it’s a strategy. At My Peeli, we turn stories into experiences that outlive campaigns.

name: Dhivya Bharathi
title: Founder
about: Dhivya Bharathi is the visionary founder of Uzhamagal, an affordable women's ethnic wear brand based in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu. Hailing from a farming family, her journey from 'Uzhavanin Magal' (Farmer's Daughter) to 'Uzhamagal' (Daughter of Labor/Effort) symbolizes empowerment, sustainability, and authenticity.With a B.Tech in Fashion, she started her business with a modest 5,000 rupees, reinvesting all profits to grow her online e-commerce clothing store, primarily through Instagram.Her motivation stems from an ideology to challenge societal norms that often limit women, aiming to empower them through personalized clothing that is 'as unique as you are'.
achievements: Founded Uzhamagal, an online e-commerce clothing brand..
Started the business with an initial investment of just 5,000 rupees..
Achieved significant financial growth, generating revenue 'in lakhs'..
Grew Instagram following to over one lakh followers, establishing a strong digital presence..
Expanded the team to include 5 on-site employees and many remote workers..
Implemented strategic outsourcing for design and tailoring works to manage order volume..
Developed a global customer base for Uzhamagal products..
Received awards as an entrepreneur..
Invited as a chief guest to her alma mater..
Featured in Business Minutes, enhancing brand visibility..
quote: I grew up with the ideology to break it and overcome it.

name: Iswaryaa G P
title: Chief Content & Growth Strategist | Content Creator
about: Iswaryaa G P is a prominent content creator and Chief Content & Growth Strategist at TownScholar. An Electrical & Electronics Engineer by academic background from NIT Tiruchirappalli, she brings a strong analytical and systematic approach to her work.She transitioned from a 'dream job' at Deloitte to pursue content creation, driven by a philosophy of 'helping > impressing' and providing genuine value to her audience.Her content focuses on career advice (IT jobs, engineering), college guidance, personal development, and productivity, aiming to simplify complex topics and empower her viewers.[3, 5, 6] She is also the creator of Peeli Digital Academy, extending her influence into digital education.
expertise: Engineering (Electrical & Electronics, MATLAB, C++, Python, IoT)
achievements: Built a substantial YouTube following of 63.5K subscribers with 176 videos, achieving high viewership (e.g., 330K, 252K, 231K views)
Maintains a strong presence on Medium, publishing in-depth articles on content writing and personal growth
Teaches 'Instagram' for 'building an audience on the internet' at the DNA School of Creatorship
Appointed Chief Content & Growth Strategist at TownScholar
Created Peeli Digital Academy, offering courses, communities, webinars, and digital products
quote: The skills that got you here might not be the ones that take you further.

name: C K Kumaravel
title: Co-founder & CMD
about: C.K. Kumaravel is a transformative figure in the Indian beauty and wellness sector, co-founder and CMD of Naturals Salon & Spa. He joined his wife, K. Veena, in 2004, after she established the first salon in 2000. He is credited with disrupting the salon industry, transforming it from a 'taboo activity' to a mainstream 'lifestyle industry' by offering good quality, affordable beauty salons. Inspired by his mother's resilience and entrepreneurial spirit, he is on a mission to create a 'Housewife-free India' by empowering women entrepreneurs through Naturals' franchise model, believing in 'women power' and their capabilities in business. He believes in the 'outsider advantage' in disruption, asserting that true innovation comes from questioning conventional practices and constantly exploring novel possibilities, citing Tesla as an example. His philosophy emphasizes resilience, learning from failures (like his first venture, Raaga Herbal Powder, which failed due to neglecting finance), and dreaming big to unlock hidden value using technology.
expertise: Value Creation (Unlocking Hidden Value with Technology)
Public Speaking (entrepreneurship, women empowerment, business success, failure, leadership)
achievements: Transformed the Indian salon industry from a 'taboo activity' to a 'lifestyle industry'
Grew Naturals to over 750 salons across 20+ states by 2024
Pioneered a franchise model that empowered over 400 women entrepreneurs by 2020, with a vision for 1000+ by 2029
Created over 8,000 direct jobs by 2016, with a target of 50,000 by 2029
Led Naturals to serve over 7 million happy customers by 2024

Received numerous awards including India's Best Beauty Salon Award (NDTV, 2011), Best National Salon Chain of the Year (Salon International, 2011), CII Emerging Entrepreneur of the Year (2015), Business Star Award (Nanayam Vikatan, 2016), and Franchise Entrepreneur of the Year (Dhanam, 2020)
Honored as 'Super Chennai Icon of the Month' by CREDAI (2025) for contribution to women's entrepreneurship and inclusive growth
Invested in Bookspark Media (Magic 20 Tamil) as a prestigious investor
Launched 'refillable beauty' model in 2024 to reduce costs and promote sustainability
Introduced new skin aesthetics brand 'Star Secrets'
Formed strategic partnerships with Assam Skill University and SRCW, Coimbatore, for skill development and women's self-employment
Partnered with HairOriginals to promote hair extensions
Appointed cricketer Smriti Mandhana as brand ambassador for D2C skincare product segment
Introduced Medical Beauty Service (Medi-Facial treatment) in salons
Collaborated with StarStruck by Sunny Leone to launch Naturals Beauty Academy (NBA) in Mumbai
Groom India (Naturals Salon) honored with 'Best Franchisee of the Year 2024' at MAPIC India Awards
Groom India - NBA partnered with IIT Madras to train talents globally through Swayam Plus
quote: If you are from the industry you cannot disrupt the industry.

name: Sivaraja Ramanathan
title: Chief Executive Officer
about: Sivaraja Ramanathan is the Chief Executive Officer of StartupTN, an initiative by the Government of Tamil Nadu to support and nurture startups and entrepreneurs across the state. He is known for his efforts in building the startup ecosystem and fostering innovation.
achievements: Appointed as CEO of StartupTN
Spearheaded initiatives to strengthen the Tamil Nadu startup ecosystem
Worked closely with entrepreneurs, incubators, and investors

name: Vaishnavi Rajalakshmi S
title: CEO & Managing Director
organization: The Gaia Sustainable Solutions Pvt Ltd & Zorg Corp Business consultation Pvt Ltd
about: Vaishnavi Rajalakshmi S is a portfolio entrepreneur and public advocate for sustainability, climate action, and social innovation. She is the CEO of The Gaia Sustainable Solutions, a venture described as a trailblazer in the textile industry offering a sustainable marketplace [1], and the Managing Director of Zorgcorpp Business Consultation Pvt. Ltd.[2] Her entrepreneurial activities also extend to the education sector as the Founder and CEO of Cosmic One, a competitive exams institute.[3, 4] A prominent voice in climate change discourse, her TEDx talk, 'Climate action - what an individual can do,' calls for personal responsibility to 'extend the timeline' of the planet's health, emphasizing that adults must serve as behavioral models for the next generation.[5] She is publicly recognized as a 'visionary CEO,' 'Sustainability promoter,' and 'humanitarian'.[3, 6]
achievements: Founder & CEO of The Gaia Sustainable Solutions Pvt Ltd, a company focused on creating a 100% sustainable marketplace for the textile industry [1]
Managing Director of Zorgcorpp Business Consultation Pvt. Ltd., a business services and consulting firm [2]
Founder & CEO of Cosmic One, an educational venture described as a competitive exams institute [3, 4]
Recognized as one of the Top 30 social Innovators of Youth Co:lab 2020, an initiative by UNDP and Citi Foundation [7, 8, 9, 10]
Publicly noted for The Gaia Sustainable Solutions' acceptance into a prestigious program at Stanford [1]
Featured speaker and panelist at Startup Grind events, sharing insights on entrepreneurship and diversity in startups [11, 4]
Founder of 'I am you Geniee,' another entrepreneurial venture mentioned in her public profile [11]
industry: Sustainability, Social Enterprise, Business Consulting, Textiles, Education
quote: Remember childrens do learn. but they copy us.

name: S. Kandasamy
title: IAS Officer
about: S. Kandasamy is an IAS officer currently serving as the District Collector of Erode. He is responsible for administration, development initiatives, and public welfare programs in the district.
achievements: Appointed as District Collector of Erode
Led multiple governance and development initiatives in Tamil Nadu

name: Srinath
title: Co-Founder
about: Srinath is associated with Agnikul Cosmos, a Chennai-based space-tech startup developing launch vehicles for small satellites. The company focuses on making space more accessible with cost-efficient and flexible launch solutions.
achievements: Part of Agnikul Cosmos, one of India’s leading private space-tech startups
Contributed to the development of Agnibaan, a customizable launch vehicle
Promotes India’s role in commercial space exploration and satellite launch services
quote: Making space accessible is the next step in human progress.

name: Deepak Rajmohan
title: Founder & CEO
about: Deepak Rajmohan is the Founder & CEO of GreenPod Labs, an agri-biotech startup pioneering plant-based, active-packaging solutions to reduce food waste and extend the shelf life of fresh produce.
achievements: Founded GreenPod Labs to tackle food waste in developing countries
Recognized through the Biomimicry Institute’s 2022 Ray of Hope Prize
Developed active packaging technology leveraging plant-based volatiles to extend produce shelf life
quote: Sustainability in food begins with reducing waste at its source.

name: Thiruppathy Srinivasan
title: CEO
organization: Centre of Excellence in Advanced Automotive Research (CAAR)
about: Thiruppathy Srinivasan is the Chief Executive Officer of CAAR, an advanced automotive R&D centre driving translational research to bridge concept-level innovation and near-market solutions within India’s automotive industry.
achievements: Leading CAAR’s efforts to reduce battery testing times from months to days
Driving collaborations with OEMs and Tier-1 suppliers like Mahindra, Tata Motors, TVS, and others
Strategizing India's automotive R&D to elevate from concept-stage prototypes to market-ready solutions
quote: Accelerating innovation means bridging the gap between ideas and impact.

name: K. Suresh Kumar
title: Executive Director
about: K. Suresh Kumar is the Executive Director of PSG-STEP, the Technology Business Incubator associated with PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore. He leads the incubation facility, supporting startups in IT, electronics, and mechanical sectors while fostering innovation and entrepreneurship.

Holds leadership roles in Indian STEPs and Business Incubators Association (ISBA) and Asia Pacific Incubation Network (APIN)
Certified Business Incubation Trainer by infoDev, World Bank Group

name: T. Sathish Kumar
title: Founder & Managing Director
about: T. Sathish Kumar is the Founder and Managing Director of Milky Mist Dairy Food Limited, a leading dairy company based in Erode, Tamil Nadu. He transformed a small milk trading business into a ₹ 1,500–2,000 crore enterprise, now recognized for its wide range of value-added dairy products and sustainable operations.
achievements: Founded Milky Mist in 1997; turned it into a ₹ 1,500-2,000 crore company :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

organization: National Research Development Corporation (NRDC), Govt. of India
about: Dr. Bijay Kumar Sahu is a seasoned intellectual property and innovation management professional serving as the Senior Regional Manager & Program Head (East) at NRDC. He leads the Intellectual Property Facilitation Centre (IPFC) and the Technology & Innovation Support Centre (TISC) and has over two decades of experience in IP, technology commercialization, and innovation ecosystem development.

title: Global Director, Engineering IT Software

title: Managing Director

achievements: Leading TICEL Biopark Ltd to support biotech research and startups in Tamil Nadu

name: Yuvarani Balakrishnan
title: Chief Executive Officer
about: Yuvarani Balakrishnan is the CEO of Dailikart Soft Tech with an academic background in Finance and IT. She brings expertise in managing technology-driven solutions while applying her knowledge of business and financial strategy to scale organizations.

Holds an MBA specializing in Finance and IT

name: Krishnan Balasubramaniam
title: Startup Coach & Mentor
about: Krishnan Balasubramaniam is a startup coach and mentor associated with IIT Madras. He has guided numerous student entrepreneurs and early-stage founders, providing direction in business strategy, product development, and scaling startups.
achievements: Mentored multiple early-stage startups at IIT Madras
Recognized for fostering innovation and entrepreneurship among students

name: Dinesh K Sundaravelu
title: CEO
about: Dinesh K Sundaravelu is the CEO of TN Research Parks Foundation under TIDCO. He is a Chevening CRISP Fellow (2025-26), with prior experience at StartupTN. He actively works in public service innovation and research ecosystem development.
achievements: Appointed CEO of TN Research Parks Foundation under TIDCO
Chevening CRISP Fellow 2025-26
Former leader at StartupTN driving startup ecosystem growth

name: P. Vivek
title: CEO
organization: Thiagarajar College of Engineering Technology Business Incubator
about: P. Vivek is a faculty member at the Department of Architecture, Thiagarajar College of Engineering. He has actively contributed to consultancy projects and has participated in numerous seminars, conferences, and workshops.
achievements: 1 consultancy project completed
Attended 23 seminars, conferences, and workshops
